summary: The bill, titled the Department of Veterans Affairs Claim Sharks Effective Warnings Act of 2025, aims to protect veterans from predatory practices by individuals acting as agents or attorneys in the claims process. It mandates improved warnings on the Department of Veterans Affairs' websites and online tools, educating veterans about potential risks and discouraging the sharing of sensitive account information. The Secretary of Veterans Affairs will implement these changes through the Chief Veterans Experience Officer. The amendments will take effect 180 days after the bill's enactment.
